title_tl: al-Baḥr al-Madīd fī Tafsīr al-Qurʾān al-Majīd Nishwār al-Muḥāḍara wa-Akhbār al-Mudhākara al-Naqd wa-al-Bayān fī Dafʿ Awhām Khuzayrān Akhbār wa-Ḥikāyāt min Ḥadīth Muḥammad ibn al-Qāsim ibn Maʿrūf Tabyīḍ al-Ṣaḥīfa bi-Uṣūl al-Aḥādīth al-Ḍaʿīfa Bughyat al-Īḍāḥ li-Talkhīṣ al-Miftāḥ fī ʿUlūm al-Balāgha Nihāyat al-Arab fī Funūn al-Adab al-Mustadrak ʿalā Majmūʿ al-Fatāwā Sharḥ al-Uthyūbī ʿalā Alfiyyat al-Suyūṭī fī al-Ḥadīth = Isʿāf Dhawī al-Waṭar bi-Sharḥ Naẓm al-Durar fī ʿIlm al-Athar al-Tamassuk bi-al-Sunan wa-al-Taḥdhīr min al-Bidaʿ al-Tanbīhāt al-Mujmala ʿalā al-Mawāḍiʿ al-Mushkila al-Thaqāfa allatī Naḥtāju ilayhā al-Ḥajj ʿArafa al-Ḥudūd fī ʿIlm al-Naḥw al-Ḥukm ʿalā al-Shayʾ Farʿ ʿan Taṣawwurihi al-Dīn wa-al-Sunan al-Kawniyya al-Dhabāʾiḥ fī Manāsik al-Ḥajj Maṣādiruhā wa-Maṣārifuhā al-Rāghib al-Aṣfahānī wa-Juhūduhu fī al-Lugha al-Raʾy al-ʿĀmm fī al-Mujtamaʿ al-Islāmī al-Rashwa al-Shams fī Niṣf al-Layl al-Furūq al-Lughawiyya ed. Muḥammad Salīm al-Ṣifāt al-Ilāhiyya fī al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunna al-Nabawiyya fī Ḍawʾ al-Ithbāt wa-al-Tanzīh Najʿat al-Rāʾid wa-Shirʿat al-Wārid fī al-Mutarādif wa-al-Mutawārid al-Iḥkām fī Uṣūl al-Aḥkām - Ibn Ḥazm Muthīr al-Gharām al-Sākin ilā Ashraf al-Amākin ed. Dār al-Ḥadīth Arbaʿūn Ḥadīthan li-ʿAlī ibn al-Mufaḍḍal al-Maqdisī Jāmiʿ al-ʿUlūm wa-al-Ḥikam ed. Abū al-Nūr al-Aḥādīth al-Subāʿiyyāt al-Alf li-al-Shaḥḥāmī al-Arbaʿūn al-Abdāl al-Tisāʿiyyāt li-al-Bukhārī wa-Muslim li-al-Dimyāṭī Tadhkirat al-Arīb fī Tafsīr al-Gharīb Maghānī al-Akhyār fī Sharḥ Asāmī Rijāl Maʿānī al-Āthār al-Qawl al-Sadīd Sharḥ Kitāb al-Tawḥīd ed. al-Wizāra Jamāl al-Qurrāʾ wa-Kamāl al-Iqrāʾ ed. al-Maʾmūn Manāqib al-Imām Abī Ḥanīfa wa-Ṣāḥibayhi Tafsīr Ibn Rajab al-Ḥanbalī al-Arbaʿīn al-Musalsala al-Mutabāyinat al-Asānīd li-Yūsuf ibn ʿAbd al-Hādī al-Taʿlīq ʿalā Fatḥ al-Bārī Iʿtiqād Aʾimmat al-Ḥadīth al-Amālī li-Murtaḍā al-Zabīdī al-Aḥādīth al-Mukhtāra al-Tawakkul wa-Suʾāl Allāh ʿAzza wa-Jalla li-ʿAbd al-Ghanī al-Maqdisī Alfiyyat al-Suyūṭī Naẓm al-Durar fī ʿIlm al-Athar ed. al-Faḥl al-ʿUqūd al-Durriyya fī Manāqib Ibn Taymiyya ed. ʿAṭāʾāt al-ʿIlm Sharḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī - Ibn Baṭṭāl al-Ibṭāl li-Naẓariyyat al-Khalṭ bayna Dīn al-Islām wa-Ghayrihi min al-Adyān Tanbīh al-Ghāfilīn bi-Aḥādīth Sayyid al-Anbiyāʾ wa-al-Mursalīn li-al-Samarqandī Maʿrifat al-Ṣaḥāba li-Abī Nuʿaym al-Juzʾ al-Thālith min Fawāʾid Abī ʿAlī al-Ṣawwāf al-Juzʾ al-Thānī min al-Ḥarbiyyāt li-ʿAlī ibn ʿUmar al-Ḥarbī Ḥilyat al-Awliyāʾ wa-Ṭabaqāt al-Aṣfiyāʾ ed. al-Saʿāda Lubāb al-Ādāb li-Usāma ibn Munqidh al-Amthāl al-Muwallada al-Juzʾ al-Thānī min Ḥadīth Abī Muḥammad Ḥājib ibn Aḥmad al-Ṭūsī al-Ḥudūd wa-al-Taʿzīrāt ʿinda Ibn al-Qayyim al-Fāḍil al-Laṭāʾif wa-al-Ẓarāʾif al-Maḥāsin wa-al-Aḍdād Rawḍ al-Akhyār al-Muntakhab min Rabīʿ al-Abrār al-Juzʾ al-Rābiʿ min al-Thaqafiyyāt li-al-Qāsim ibn al-Faḍl al-Thaqafī al-Juzʾ al-Rābiʿ min al-Fawāʾid al-Muntaqāt al-ʿAwālī min Ḥadīth al-Qaṭīʿī Ṭawq al-Ḥamāma li-Ibn Ḥazm al-Imtāʿ wa-al-Muʾānasa Tafsīr Ibn Fūrak Inbāh al-Ruwāt ʿalā Anbāh al-Nuḥāt Maʿālim al-Qurba fī Ṭalab al-Ḥisba Mashāriq al-Anwār ʿalā Ṣiḥāḥ al-Āthār al-Awāʾil li-al-ʿAskarī Akhlāq Ahl al-Qurʾān al-Awrāq Qism Akhbār al-Shuʿarāʾ al-Amthāl - Ibn Rifāʿa Iṣlāḥ al-Masājid min al-Bidaʿ wa-al-ʿAwāʾid al-Munṣif li-Ibn Jinnī, Sharḥ Kitāb al-Taṣrīf li-Abī ʿUthmān al-Māzinī al-Madāris al-Naḥwiyya Tārīkh Ādāb al-ʿArab Sharḥ al-ʿAqīda al-Ṭaḥāwiyya - bi-Takhrīj al-Albānī al-Falak al-Dāʾir ʿalā al-Mathal al-Sāʾir al-Mathal al-Sāʾir fī Adab al-Kātib wa-al-Shāʿir ed. al-Ḥūfī
